Package services

Class Service

java.lang.Object
services.Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClearService, DataRetrieveService, FillService, LoadService, LoginService, RegisterService
public abstract class Service
extends java.lang.Object
Base class of all service classes. This class contains strings for each of the possible errors that can occur while a service is executing. It also implements the server's logger with entry and exit functions.
